newsitem.title: USA: Giant Industries sees sharply lower profits.
newsitem.headline: Giant Industries sees sharply lower profits.

text.p: Giant Industries Inc said Tuesday it expects to report first quarter earnings per share of $0.06 to $0.10 compared with $0.21 a year earlier.
The First Call consensus estimate for the latest quarter is $0.09.

"While I am not pleased with these estimated earnings, I believe first quarter earnings across the industry will be lower than those reported in the first quarter of 1996," chief executive Jim Acridge said.
"I am, however, encouraged with the improvement in refining margins that we have seen over the past month."
Giant has "identified several potential opportunities which, if completed, could immediately contribute to shareholder value," Acridge added.
